io.spine.server.event

Class DispatcherEventDelivery

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.delivery.Delivery<E,C>
      • io.spine.server.delivery.MulticastDelivery<io.spine.core.EventEnvelope,io.spine.core.EventClass,EventDispatcher<?>>
        • io.spine.server.event.DispatcherEventDelivery

  • @SPI
public abstract class DispatcherEventDelivery
extends MulticastDelivery<io.spine.core.EventEnvelope,io.spine.core.EventClass,EventDispatcher<?>>
    A base class for the strategies on delivering the events from the event bus to the corresponding event dispatchers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected DispatcherEventDelivery()
      Creates an instance of event delivery with a direct executor used for event dispatching.
      protected DispatcherEventDelivery(java.util.concurrent.Executor delegate)
      Create a dispatcher event delivery with an Executor used for the operation.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeliveryAction

        protected java.lang.Runnable getDeliveryAction(EventDispatcher<?> consumer,
                                               io.spine.core.EventEnvelope envelope)
        Description copied from class: Delivery
        Defines what should be done to deliver a given deliverable to the targetConsumer.

        Each Delivery implementation defines this behaviour depending on the type of the consumer.

        The result is defined as Runnable, as this action will be executed by a delegate Executor, according to the strategy implementation regulated by shouldPostponeDelivery() and deliverNow() methods.

        Specified by:
        getDeliveryAction in class Delivery<io.spine.core.EventEnvelope,EventDispatcher<?>>
        Parameters:
        consumer - the consumer to deliver the item to
        envelope - the item to be delivered
        Returns:
        the action on how to deliver the given item to the consumer.

      • directDelivery

        public static DispatcherEventDelivery directDelivery()
        Obtains a pre-defined instance of the DispatcherEventDelivery, which does NOT postpone any event dispatching and uses direct executor for operation.
        Returns:
        the pre-configured direct delivery
